column1: Ragash was a Moria Orcs scout who was part of Azogs army in The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies. He was played by Alan Smith and voiced by Martin Kwok.
As the Orc army is making its way to the Lonely Mountain through the tunnels burrowed by the Were-worms
column2: Ragash alerts Azog that the army will be ready to attack the Mountain by dawn. It is unknown if Ragash survived the Battle of Five Armies.The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
